title: Is Canada failing in containing COVID-19? - Quora

response.answer_text: Not at all. Quite a number of people are underestimating the problem of handling a murderous novel virus though. No matter how well our leaders strategise, we are all at the mercy of people who are too selfish , too carefree, or too stupid to protect themseles , and indirectly others. Selfish. Car efree. Stupid. That’ s a lot to have to deal with.

We are all doing our part and working together. It is a nasty virus and the numbers aren’t where we want them to be. But, our leadership is transparent and we are focused on fighting the virus and not each other. I am optimistic about the future but focused on doing what I can to mitigate risk and hoping others are also doing their part.
